questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product's contents, as visibly shown through the transparent container?

What material is predominantly used for the primary container holding the product, judging from its visual characteristics?

Judging by the image, what is the apparent color of the secondary packaging or outer layer?

Based on the image, what is the apparent nature of the markings on the side of the container?
